name: KHAN-MD
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by J·¥Ä·¥°·¥Ä·¥Ö T·¥á·¥Ñ úX

PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep bot always online when receiving messages. Options: 'true' or 'false'

AUTO_TYPING.description: Show typing indicator when receiving messages. Options: 'true' (both), 'inbox' (inbox only), 'group' (group only), 'false' (disabled)

AUTO_DOWNLOADER.description: Auto-Download Media From links. Options: 'true' (both), 'inbox' (inbox only), 'group' (group only), 'owner' (owner only), 'false' (disabled)

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Show recording indicator when receiving messages. Options: 'true' (both), 'inbox' (inbox only), 'group' (group only), 'false' (disabled)

ANTI_STATUS_MENTION.description: Control anti-status-mention feature in groups. Options: 'true' (enable), 'false' (disable), 'warn', 'delete'

ANTI_MENTION.description: Prevent unauthorized mentions of the bot. Options: 'true' (enable), 'false' (disable), 'warn', 'delete'

ANTI_DELETE.description: set true for show deleted messages. ( true / false )

ANTI_DELETE_PATH.description: change it to -same- if you want to resend deleted message in same chat otherwise inbox

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: make it true for automatic status reaction or like.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply msg on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words.

MENTION_REPLY.description: make it true if want mention reply if someone menetion you.

BOT_MEDIA_URL.description: URL for bot media (images/videos) used in menu and other commands. Supported formats ( .jpg, .jpeg, .png, or .mp4 )

DESCRIPTION.description: add caption for menu and other

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: put here custom react react emojis.

STATUS_REACT_EMOJIS.description: put here custom status react react emojis.

ADMIN_ACTION.description: make it true if want know who promote or demote a member .

WELCOME.description: make it true if want welcome message in groups.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want bot read your all sms just now.
